article_title: They’ll ‘paint the night blue’ for SCAN
article_text:

og.description: The fifth annual Iredell County Stop Child Abuse Now "Paint the Night Blue" fundraising event will be held at Queen’s Landing on May 23, with music by Too Much Sylvia and Exit 474.
